manpage.title: __isascii

description.para: Returns true if c is a 7-bit unsigned character value that fits into the US/UK ASCII character set. This function is a BSD extension and is also an SVID extension.

return.para: If c is an ASCII character,then __isascii returns a non-zero value (in the range 0x00 - 0x7F). It returns 0 if c does not satisfy the test condition.

manpage.result: c is an ASCII character. d is not an ASCII character.
